home.benefit4_desc: Participate in expert workshops and conferences.
home.testimonial1_quote: "A fundamental initiative for the development of Panama Este."

about.title: About the Fair
about.description: A pioneering event that seeks to boost agricultural, livestock, business, and entrepreneurial development in the Panama Este region...
about.pageSubtitle: Driving the future of agriculture, livestock, business, and entrepreneurship in Panama Este.
about.storyTextP1: The First International Fair of Panama Este was born from the vision of creating a unique convergence space for the economic and development pillars of our vibrant region. We identified the need for a platform that not only celebrates our achievements in the agricultural and livestock sectors but also drives business innovation and fosters the entrepreneurial spirit that characterizes Panama Este.
about.storyTextP2: We firmly believe in the potential of our people and our land. This fair is an invitation to dream big, to connect, to learn, and to build together a more prosperous and sustainable future for all.
about.missionText: To foster innovation, trade, and knowledge in the agricultural, livestock, business, and entrepreneurship sectors, driving the sustainable development of Panama Este.
about.visionText: To be the leading international fair that positions Panama Este as a hub of economic development, innovation, and opportunities, recognized for its excellence and contribution to regional and national progress.
about.valuesText: Innovation, Collaboration, Sustainability, Excellence, Integrity, and Inclusion.
about.impactTitle: Impact on Panama Este and its Sectors
about.impactIntro: The fair is designed to generate a positive and tangible impact on our community and its economic pillars:
about.impactAgroText: Access to new technologies, improvement of productive practices, resource optimization, and opening to national and international markets for our farmers.
about.impactLivestockText: Promotion of genetic improvement, implementation of good management and animal health practices, and a platform for showcasing the region's livestock excellence.
about.impactBusinessText: Creation of valuable networking opportunities, establishment of strategic alliances, increased visibility for local businesses, and attraction of investment.
about.impactEntrepreneurshipText: A launchpad for new ideas and startups, access to mentorship, visibility to potential investors, and promotion of a culture of innovation.
about.organizersSectionIntro: This fair is made possible thanks to the dedication and collaboration of the following entities:

organizers.org1Name: Chamber of Commerce of Panama Este
organizers.org1Desc: Promoting business and commercial development in the region.
organizers.org2Desc: Supporting local producers with resources and representation.
organizers.org3Desc: Committed to the progress and well-being of Panama Este.

about.whatToExpectText: Prepare for an immersive experience with cutting-edge exhibitions, keynote speeches from thought leaders, practical workshops, live demonstrations of new technologies, vibrant business rounds, a dedicated entrepreneurship zone, and a rich cultural and gastronomic offer celebrating the best of Panama Este.

activities.pageSubtitle: Immerse yourself in a world of knowledge, innovation, and entertainment.
activities.introText: From keynote conferences to interactive demonstrations and cultural shows, the First International Fair of Panama Este offers something for everyone. Use the filters to find the activities that interest you most!
activities.noResults: No activities found matching your filters.
activities.item1_desc: The best specimens from the region.
activities.carouselSubtitle: A glimpse into some of the unmissable experiences awaiting you at the fair.

calendar.noEvents: No events scheduled for this date or category.

eventOpening.title: Grand Opening Ceremony
eventOpening.description: Join us for the official start of the First International Fair of Panama Este 2025.
eventOpening.longDescription: The opening ceremony will mark the beginning of five days filled with innovation, business, and culture. We will have authorities, inspiring speeches, and a special presentation. Don't miss it!

eventClosing.title: Closing Ceremony and Acknowledgments
eventClosing.description: Summary of the fair, awards (if applicable), and closing remarks.
eventClosing.longDescription: We will celebrate the success of the first edition of the fair, thank participants and collaborators, and look towards the future. There will be surprises and a festive atmosphere.

sampledescs.desc2: Learn from experts and take your knowledge to the next level.

sampledescs.desc4: Connect with investors and take the next big step for your venture.
sampledescs.desc5: Don't miss this incredible display of innovation and power.

samplelongdescs.longdesc1: This activity offers a complete immersion in [topic]. Throughout the session, participants will have the opportunity to interact with experts, ask questions, and gain practical knowledge applicable immediately. Arriving in advance is recommended.
samplelongdescs.longdesc2: Designed for both beginners and those with prior experience, this event will cover everything from fundamentals to the most advanced techniques. Materials will be provided, and there will be a networking space знаний.
samplelongdescs.longdesc3: A unique opportunity to witness [something exciting]. Ideal for the whole family, this event promises to be one of the highlights of the fair, combining entertainment with learning in a dynamic and unforgettable way.

location.title: Find Us
location.pageSubtitle: We await you in the heart of Panama Este.
location.address: Main Fair Avenue, Corregimiento de Pacora, Panama Este, Republic of Panama
location.referencePoints: References: Near the New Road Interchange, opposite Super X.
location.howToGetThereTitle: How to Get to the Fair
location.byCarDesc1: From downtown, take the Pan-American Highway East.
location.byCarDesc2: Use the exit palavras Pacora/Chepo and follow the signs to the fairgrounds.
location.byPublicTransportDesc1: MiBus routes to Pacora (e.g., S420, E428) will get you close.
location.byPublicTransportDesc2: Check for the nearest stops on the MiBus app or Google Maps.
location.byPublicTransportDesc3: From Nuevo Tocumen Metro station, you can take a taxi or complementary bus.
location.parkingDesc: We have ample free parking areas for visitors within the fairgrounds. Please follow staff directions upon arrival.
location.accessibilityDesc: The fairgrounds are equipped with ramps and access for people with reduced mobility. Accessible restrooms are available. Please contact our staff if you require special assistance.

contact.pageSubtitle: We are ready to answer your questions and hear your ideas.
contact.introText: Do you have any questions about the fair, want to participate as an exhibitor, sponsor, or simply want to know more? Fill out the form or use our other contact channels. We'd love to hear from you!

form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will contact you soon.
form.error: Oops. There was an error sending your message. Please try again or use another contact channel.

contact.officeAddress: Fair Central Offices, Innovation Building, 2nd Floor, Panama Este
